175.title: Fantastic Four
notes:
A chronological list of stories and appearances of the Fantastic Four begins here. Most are in the periodicals
  • Fantastic Four
  • Fantastic Four Annual
The members of the Fantastic Four are
  • The Human Torch (Johnny Storm)
  • The Invisible Girl (Sue Storm)
  • Mr. Fantastic (Reed Richards)
  • The Thing (Ben Grimm)
    see also the supervillain
  • Doctor Doom
